Name: Fifty.ServerVote [FSV]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements voting functionality

Dependencies:
  - Northstar
  - Fifty.ServerUtilities
  - Fifty.ServerChatCommands

ConVars.Name: FSV_ENABLE_RUI
ConVars.HelpString: Enables/Disables displaying notifications and statuses of votes in progress using RUI.

ConVars.Name: FSV_ENABLE_CHATUI
ConVars.HelpString: Enables/Disables displaying notifications and statuses of votes in progress using chat messages.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_SKIP_PERCENTAGE
ConVars.HelpString: Percentage of players needed for a vote to skip a map to succeed.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_SKIP_DURATION
ConVars.HelpString: The duration of skip votes in seconds.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_EXTENDING_PERCENTAGE
ConVars.HelpString: Percentage of players needed for a vote to extend map time to succeed.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_EXTENDING_DURATION
ConVars.HelpString: The duration of extend votes in seconds.

ConVars.Name: FSV_ENABLE_KICK_VOTING
ConVars.HelpString: Enables/Disables the !kick command. Remains enabled for admins.

ConVars.Name: FSV_KICK_MIN_PLAYERS
ConVars.HelpString: Number of players that have to be on before kick voting someone is possible.

ConVars.Name: FSV_KICK_PERCENTAGE
ConVars.HelpString: Percentage of players needed for a vote kick to succeed.

ConVars.Name: FSV_KICK_BLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: Number of matches a kicked player is blocked from re-joining. Setting this to zero would allow immediate re-join.

ConVars.Name: FSV_KICK_DURATION
ConVars.HelpString: The duration of kick votes in seconds.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_REPLAY_LIMIT
ConVars.HelpString: How many before the same map can be played again. Set to one to only prevent current map from playing again

ConVars.Name: FSV_CUSTOM_MAP_ROTATION
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to use FSV_MAP_ROTATION for a custom map rotation.

ConVars.Name: FSV_RANDOM_MAP_ROTATION
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to randomise the playlist, or to rotate through it in order.

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_ROTATION
ConVars.HelpString: A list of maps in the map rotation which can also be voted for. You can write the map IDs, names, or partial names. Separated by commas. ( run 'maps *' in the console to check maps loaded )

ConVars.Name: FSV_MAP_VOTE_ONLY
ConVars.HelpString: A list of maps which arent in the map rotation, but can be voted for. You can write the map IDs, names, or partial names. Separated by commas.
